definition-item.definition-title: CRUSHING, PULVERISING, OR DISINTEGRATING IN GENERAL; MILLING GRAIN ({household tools and machines for pulverising foodstuffs, e.g. coffee and spice mills A47J42/00; pharmaceutical mortars A61J3/02; mechanical processing of refuse and garbage B03B9/06; dressing mould materials by grinding B22C5/04}; obtaining metallic powder by crushing, grinding or milling B22F9/04; {recovery of plastics by disintegrating B29B17/00; crushing raw materials in starch making C08B30/02; beaters for papermaking D21D1/02; crushing devices specially for transport in mines E21F13/002; slag crushing devices F23J1/00; fuel milling devices in combustion apparatus F23K1/00; household devices for crushing coal F24B15/02; ice disintegrating devices F25C5/02})

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: Apparatus and methods for crushing, pulverizing, comminuting, disintegrating by using reciprocating or rotary crushers, by using rollers or balls, discs or rotary beaters, by tumbling, by using knives or other cutting or tearing members, by using fluid jets.
Auxiliary devices, accessories for such devices e.g. safety, and auxiliary methods.
Control arrangements for crushing or disintegrating.
Combinations of such apparatus with other devices, e.g. for separating or sorting.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Preparing specimens for investigation involving mechanical work, e.g. chopping, disintegrating, compacting, homogenising

definition-item.definition-title: Crushing or disintegrating by reciprocating members

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Crushing where the crushing or disintegrating members are only reciprocating.

definition-item.definition-title: Mills with non-rotating spiked members

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Disintegrating devices with spiked members specially adapted for breaking-up bottles:

definition-item.definition-title: Crushing or disintegrating by gyratory or cone crushers {(with non-coaxial discs with intersecting axes B02C7/005)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Crushers with a gyrating conical head and a bowl assembly surrounding the head; normally the head is driven.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cone crushers with non-coaxial discs with intersecting axes

definition-item.definition-title: Crushing or disintegrating by roller mills (with milling members in the form of rollers or balls co-operating with rings or discs B02C15/00; roller mills or roll refiners exclusively for chocolate A23G1/10, A23G1/12)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Roller mills with two or more rollers; with a roller co-operating with a stationary member like a plate, a bar a grid or grating or co-operating with a conveyor.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Roller mills with milling members in the form of rollers or balls co-operating with rings or discs

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Roller mills or roll refiners exclusively for chocolate
Presses characterised by the use of rotary pressing members, e.g. rollers, rings, discs

section-body.paragraph-text: In the cases where the roller mill is adapted for milling a paste-like material or grain, the document is classified in the appropriate subgroup of B02C4/00, e.g. B02C4/04, B02C4/06, B02C4/22. For searching, other classes, where the roller mill is not adapted for the specific material concerned, have to be considered.

definition-item.definition-title: Crushing or disintegrating by disc mills (apparatus specially adapted for manufacture or treatment of cocoa or cocoa products exclusively A23G1/04)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Disc mills used to grind, fiberize, pulverize, granulate or refine a feedstock which is fed between opposing discs or plates. The discs may be grooved, serrated or spiked.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Apparatus specially adapted for manufacture or treatment of cocoa or cocoa products

definition-item.definition-title: Shape or construction of discs

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Discs for disc mills for refining paper pulp

definition-item.definition-title: Other milling methods or mills specially adapted for grain

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Methods or mills, systems, plants or sequences of operations specially adapted for grain with the meaning of cereal grain.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Combined processes for grain treatment

definition-item.definition-title: Other auxiliary devices or accessories specially adapted for grain mills

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
All auxiliary devices and accessories specially adapted for grain mills like disagglomerators, special sifting and separating, feeding, cooling, heating, conditioning arrangements.

definition-item.definition-title: Disintegrating by mills having rotary beater elements{; Hammer mills}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Mills with beaters rigidly connected or hinged for swinging movement to a horizontally or vertically arranged rotor for crushing material by impact. The material may be thrown against an anvil or impact member.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for disintegrating materials by collision of these materials against a breaking surface or breaking body and/or by friction between the material particles (also for gra)

definition-item.definition-title: with intermeshing pins{; Pin Disk Mills}

section-body.paragraph-text: Mills with intermeshing elements like pins or other impact members, where both disks are rotating, are additionally classified in B02C13/205.

definition-item.definition-title: Disintegrating by milling members in the form of rollers or balls co-operating with rings or discs {(high-speed drum mills B02C19/11)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Mills with rollers or balls co-operating with stationary or rotating rings arranged according to the titles of the sub-groups; many for coal or ore.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cocoa; Cocoa products, e.g. chocolate; Substitutes therefore; Mixing apparatus; Roller mills for preparing chocolate
Selective separation of solid materials carried by, or dispersed in, gas currents using centrifugal force
Selective separation of solid materials carried by, or dispersed in, gas currents, gas currents using centrifugal force, generated by rotating vanes, discs, drums, or brushes
Machines or devices specially designed for dressing or handling the mould material so far as specially adapted for that purpose by grinding, blending, mixing, kneading, or stirring
Casting in, on, or around objects which form part of the product; for manufacturing or repairing tools
Preparation of lump or pulverulent fuel in readiness for delivery to combustion apparatus

definition-item.definition-title: Disintegrating by tumbling mills, i.e. mills having a container charged with the material to be disintegrated with or without special disintegrating members such as pebbles or balls (high-speed drum mills B02C19/11{; drums for polishing or grinding B24B})

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Mills having a rotating, perforated or un-perforated or a fixed container, charged with the material to be disintegrated, with or without special disintegrating members such as pebbles or balls, and/or with or without special stirring means; feeding and discharging devices with the associated sorting or separating arrangements.
Shape, material of grinding media, e.g. balls, pebbles, rods.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Medicinal preparations characterised by special physical form; Particulate form, e.g. powders
Mixing

Machines or devices designed for polishing or abrading surfaces on work by means of tumbling apparatus or other apparatus in which the work and/or the abrasive material is loose; Accessories therefore; involving rotary barrels

section-body.paragraph-text: Discharging devices combined with sorting or separating of material, as well as adding fluid, other than for crushing by fluid energy are classified in the appropriate sub-groups of B02C17/1835 and B02C17/186 and not in the sub-groups of B02C23/08 and B02C23/18. For searching the B02C23/00 and subgroups should be considered.

definition-item.definition-title: Disintegrating by knives or other cutting or tearing members which chop material into fragments {(tree stump comminutors A01G23/067)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: Shredding of material into fragments; knives therefore and mountings thereof; feed or discharge means therefore.
Mincing machines with perforated discs and feeding worms.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cutting apparatus specially adapted for cutting hay, straw or the like
Cutting implements specially adapted for horticultural purposes, for comminuting plant waste
Forestry; extracting or eliminating stumps by comminuting the tree stumps
Fodder distributors with mixer or shredder
Processing meat, poultry or fish
Fodder mashers
Kitchen equipment; coffee mills; spice mills; apparatus for making beverages
Machines for domestic use not covered elsewhere, e.g. for grinding, mixing, stirring, kneading, emulsifying, whipping or beating foodstuffs, e.g. power-driven
Cutting; Details common to machines for perforating, punching, cutting-out, stamping-out or severing
Cutting through work characterised by the nature or movement of the cutting member; Apparatus or machines therefore; Cutting members therefore
Manufacture of wood shavings, chips, powder, or the like
Working of plastics; Conditioning or physical treatment of the material to be shaped by grinding, e.g. by triturating; by sieving; by filtering
Recovery of plastics or other constituents of waste material containing plastics; Disintegrating plastic
Disintegrating apparatus specially adapted for installation in waste pipes or outlets
Pumps adapted for handling specific fluids with means for comminuting, mixing stirring or otherwise treating

definition-item.definition-title: Details

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Details in relation to the shredder housing, jam prevention, safety, lubrication of the knives and the like.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Disintegrating by knives or other cutting or tearing members which chop materials into fragments, specially adapted for disintegrating documents

definition-item.definition-title: Other disintegrating devices or methods (for grain B02C9/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: Crushing by endless flexible members; by collision of materials against a breaking surface or breaking body and/or by friction between the material particles;
Disintegrating devices or methods specially adapted for specific materials;

Jet mills; pestle and mortar arrangements; mills in which a friction block is towed along the surface; mills provided with vibrators; use of auxiliary physical effects, e.g. ultrasonics, irradiation, cold or heat for disintegrating; grating; crushing mills with screw-shaped crushing means.

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Rotors with beater elements

definition-item.definition-title: {specially adapted for breaking-up fluorescent tubes}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Recovery of material from discharge tubes or lamps

definition-item.definition-title: {specially adapted for breaking-up bottles}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Presses specially adapted for consolidating empty containers, e.g. cans

definition-item.definition-title: Pestle and mortar

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Pill breaking or crushing devices

definition-item.definition-title: Disintegrating plant with or without drying of the material (for grain B02C9/04)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Disintegrating plants normally with at least two disintegration devices; transportable disintegration plants may be equipped solely with one crusher or disintegration device.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Milling plants specially adapted for grain

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cutting implements specially adapted for horticultural purposes, for comminuting plant waste
Forestry; extracting or eliminating stumps by comminuting the tree stumps
Transportable screening plants
Crushing, pulverising or disintegrating apparatus

definition-item.definition-title: Auxiliary methods or auxiliary devices or accessories specially adapted for crushing or disintegrating not provided for in preceding groups or not specially adapted to apparatus covered by a single preceding group ({specially adapted for grain mills B02C11/00;} separating or sorting in general B03, B04, B07)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Feeding devices, safety devices, disintegrating additives, separating or sorting of material associated with crushing or disintegrating, adding fluid, liquids or gases which are not intended for crushing or disintegrating.

residual-references.section-title: References out of a residual place

section-body.paragraph-text: Examples of places in relation to which this place is residual:

table-column.paragraph-text: Feeding devices for gyratory or cone crushers
Feeding devices for roller mills
Feeding devices specially adapted for grain mills
Arrangements for preventing fire or explosion in grain mills
Feeding or discharge for mills having rotary beater elements
Safety devices or measures for mills having rotary beater elements
Feeding or discharging devices for tumbling mills
Feed or discharge means for disintegraters with knives or other cutting or tearing members

definition-item.definition-title: Control arrangements specially adapted for crushing or disintegrating

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Overall control arrangements and methods.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Jaw clearance or overload control for jaw crushers
Crushing or disintegrating by gyratory or cone crushers moved by an eccentric weight
Crushing or disintegrating by gyratory or cone crushers eccentrically moved with vertical axis and with bowl adjusting or controlling mechanisms
Adjusting, applying pressure to or controlling the distance between milling members in roller mills
Driving mechanisms; Roller speed control in roller mills
Controlling the distance between discs in disc mills
Controlling the distance between discs in disc mills adapted for grain
Monitoring devices for tumbling mills
